Package org.jplot2d.env

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CommandLogger
    A logger to record command invocation.
    ElementAddition
    Interface that provide methods for called from an environment.
    ElementChangeListener
    Listen to the structure change, such as adding or removing an element.
    StyleConfiguration
    Define default properties which can be used to initialize the new created plot component.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BatchToken  
    DummyEnvironment  
    ElementChangeEvent
    Encapsulates information describing changes to a hierarchy structure or properties of an element.
    ElementIH
    This InvocationHandler intercept calls on proxy objects, and wrap the calls with environment lock.
    Environment
    An environment that a plot can realization.
    InterfaceInfo
    This class extract properties from method declaration, rather than using java introspector.
    LoggingCommandLogger
    A logger to log command to java logger "org.jplot2d.command".
    PlotEnvironment
    This Environment can host a plot instance and provide undo/redo ability.
    PropertyInfo
    Information of a property.
    RenderEnvironment
    This environment extends plot environment to add ability to render a plot.
    StylePreferences
    StyleConfiguration who can persist in java Preferences.
    SystemOutCommandLogger
    A logger to print command invocation to system out.
    UndoManager<E>
    Maintains a queue of undo sets, a current set, and a redo sets.
    UndoMemento
